page.title: 11SUNNINGDALE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: There is a wide variety of shops which,like any village sell products which range from clothes to vegetables.There are also restaurants, pubs,garages,banks and quite a few other amenities.Many people from the county of Berkshire shop in this village for vital foodstuffs,fashion wear etc.To find out more a survey was carried out among 100 shoppers.It was found that most visitors came by car and used the large car park.Nearly all the visitors came to buy food but the banks,hairdresser and Post Office were also popular. Most of the local people thought it was a good shopping centre but a bit pricey.They also seemed satisfied with the other facilities of the area,such as schools,doctors,dentists and places of worship.
